quote: All my life I’ve lived a beautiful lie. The governor’s son with the bright future set for him. The middle child. The one who no one knew how bad he was suffering until it made the nightly news.
quote_letters: ALL MY LIFE IVE LIVED A BEAUTIFUL LIE THE GOVERNORS SON WITH THE BRIGHT FUTURE SET FOR HIM THE MIDDLE CHILD THE ONE WHO NO ONE KNEW HOW BAD HE WAS SUFFERING UNTIL IT MADE THE NIGHTLY NEWS
